description: This module forms one of the component certificates in the Master of Technology in Software Engineering (MTech(SE)). The goal of MTech(SE) is to provide the Singapore workforce with the practical skills in architecting smart IOT systems. The objectives of this course is to learn how to Architect smart, scalable, end-to-end platforms for IoT, transducers, and other devices. Topics include:  IoT lifecycle: Sense, Ingest, Process, Respond and Analyse  End-to-end IoT architecture  Fog architecture, layered model, design patterns, cloud services, device integration, communication standards, DevOps  Workflow orchestration with device, fog, and platform layers  RTOS and real-world design constraints  Real-time scheduling, synchronisation and communication, multithreaded design, fault-tolerant design  IoT hardware and software technologies  Sensors, processors, pipelines, boards, real-time operating systems, gateways, deployment
title: Architecting IOT Solutions
